title: Jamf Pro - System, Server & Miscellaneous Events
description: - This dashboard provides key insights into system and server events, including DEP enrollments, server status, patch updates, push notifications, API activity, SCEP challenges, and smart group changes.

definition.content:
This dashboard provides key insights into system and server events, including DEP enrollments, server status, patch updates, push notifications, API activity, SCEP challenges, and smart group changes.

For more information, see the [Jamf Pro Integration Documentation](https://docs.datadoghq.com/integrations/jamf_pro/).

**Tips**
- Use the timeframe selector in the top right of the dashboard to change the default timeframe.
- Clone this dashboard to rearrange, modify and add widgets and visualizations.

definition.title: Devices Added to DEP over Time
Patch Updates Title Updates Events over Time
Distribution of Events by Software Versions
Top Users by Failed API Operations Failure Rate
Distribution of Events by Method Type
Smart Group Mobile Device Membership Change

definition.content: Datadog Cloud SIEM analyzes and correlates Jamf Pro events to detect threats to your environment in real time. If you don't see signals please make sure you've enabled [Datadog Cloud SIEM](/security).
